\hypertarget{class_open_x_l_s_x_1_1_x_l_app_properties}{}\doxysection{Open\+XLSX\+::XLApp\+Properties Class Reference}
\label{class_open_x_l_s_x_1_1_x_l_app_properties}\index{OpenXLSX::XLAppProperties@{OpenXLSX::XLAppProperties}}


This class is a specialization of the XLAbstract\+XMLFile, with the purpose of the representing the document app properties in the app.\+xml file (doc\+Props folder) in the .xlsx package.  




{\ttfamily \#include $<$XLProperties.\+hpp$>$}

\doxysubsection{Detailed Description}
This class is a specialization of the XLAbstract\+XMLFile, with the purpose of the representing the document app properties in the app.\+xml file (doc\+Props folder) in the .xlsx package. Inheritance diagram for Open\+XLSX\+::XLApp\+Properties\+:\begin{figure}[H]
\begin{center}
\leavevmode
\includegraphics[height=2.000000cm]{class_open_x_l_s_x_1_1_x_l_app_properties}
\end{center}
\end{figure}
